message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000.  I think you'll be very happy with it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  While $15,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this product will truly benefit you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $15,000 and $18,000. How about $16,000?
